heading: Wednesday Night
text: Scattered snow showers, numerous in the northern mountains

heading: Thursday
text: Scattered to numerous snow showers, maybe mixing with valley rain.
temperature: Lower 30s to mid 40s, north to south

heading: Friday
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south

heading: Saturday
text: Partly cloudy; chance of late-day rain or mix in the St. Lawrence Valley.
temperature: Lower 30s to lower 40s, north to south
